alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 1:44PM CDT until July 22 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Marion County in south central Mississippi... Northeastern Forrest County in southeastern Mississippi... Central Lamar County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 144 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ovett to near Oak Grove to Morgantown, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Hattiesburg and West Hattiesburg around 155 PM CDT. Oak Grove around 200 PM CDT. Pine Ridge around 215 PM CDT. Purvis and Pickwick around 230 PM CDT. Pine Burr around 240 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
